mapper.insert: insert into goods_kind (goods_kind_id, goods_kind_name, goods_kind_flag, admin_id) values (#{goodsKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsKindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsKindFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select goods_kind_id, goods_kind_name, goods_kind_flag, admin_id from goods_kind
